Locale.Value:
- Added card list, which can be used to record global notes
- Added automatic replacement function
- Added vertical arrangement view for the left panel
- Improved outline view
- Display custom metadata in document info panel
- Other minor bug fixes and style adjustments

- 新增卡片列表功能，可用于记录全局备忘
- 新增输入内容自动替换功能
- 左侧面板增加纵向排列视图
- 改进大纲视图
- 在文档信息面板显示自定义元数据
- 其他小问题修复以及样式调整
